reset.title: ARU Reset
reset.description: Reset the ARU output to its initial (OFF) state.

io.do: Digital output port DO[0], DO[1], and DO[7] are OFF.
io.to0: Tool digital output port TO[0] is OFF.

ioConfig.title: I/O Port Configuration
ioConfig.to0: Tool digital output port is OFF

note.label: Note:
note.text: You should eject a mandrel after the end of riveting.

ioConfig.title: I/O Port Configuration
ioConfig.to0: Tool digital output port is ON

parameters.title: Adjustable Parameters
parameters.description: There is a slider to adjust the time for the riveting switch to be switched on.

mandrel.title: Mandrel Ejection
mandrel.description: Finish the riveting operation, and check whether a mandrel ejected or not.

ioConfig.title: I/O Port Configuration
ioConfig.to0: Tool digital output port is OFF

parameters.title: Adjustable Parameters
parameters.description: There is a slider to adjust the checking time for mandrel ejection.

supply.title: Rivet Supply
supply.description: Pressurises a rivet from ARF-700 to the feed head unit.

note.label: Note:
note.text: Turn on the vacuum switch. Move to the supply point before this node.

ioConfig.title: I/O Port Configuration
ioConfig.do1: Finger open/close operation output port (HIGH: finger close)

parameters.title: Adjustable Parameters
parameters.description: There are 3 sliders for adjusting the following timing parameters:

check.title: Rivet Check
check.description: Check a rivet by the optical sensor.

note.label: Note:
note.text: Move to the check point before this node.

ioConfig.title: I/O Port Configuration
ioConfig.do7: Error output port (if a rivet not set, this port is ON)

aru-pg-reset.description: Reset the ARU output to its initial (OFF) state. DO[0], DO[1], DO[7] TO[0] are OFF.

aru-pg-finish.description: Finish the riveting operation. TO[0] is OFF.

aru-pg-mandrel-ejection.label: Mandrel Ejection: check time
aru-pg-mandrel-ejection.programLabel: Check if mandrel is ejected after {{checkTime}} sec

aru-pg-rivet-supply.title: Rivet Supply:
aru-pg-rivet-supply.programLabel: check time {{time2Check}} sec, open time {{time2Open}} sec, stop time {{time2Stop}} sec

aru-pg-check.description: Check a rivet by the optical sensor.
aru-pg-check.programLabel: Check a rivet by the optical sensor
